author: mike@nachbaur.com
msg: Added support for generating Doxygen documentation for the iPhone classes

author: mike@nachbaur.com
msg: Extended konobi's build-time XCode script to build JavaScript sources.
Added a "configure" script to generate a Makefile which builds the necessary
JavaScript libraries in a clean fashion, keeping in mind dependancy change times.
So therefore it will rebuild only the files needed when a "make" is run.
Makes documentation as well, now in "docs/javascript".
I've also removed the pre-built PhoneGap JS libraries and documentation, as
generated files shouldn't be checked in.  It made merging between branches
I've left the Rakefile, but I'd like to see the Makefile used, since it is
more flexible, and respects file timestamps.

author: scott+github@konobi.co.uk
msg: Tidy up PhoneGap project and add a buildtime script
